remarks: The ring constructed from a ` Z/nZ ` structure with ` 1 < n ` by replacing the (multiplicative) ring operation by a constant operation is not a unital ring.  (Contributed by AV, 17-Feb-2020.)
statement:
cznrng.y $e |- Y = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
cznrng.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
cznrng.x $e |- X = ( Y sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , ( x e. B , y e. B |-> C ) >. ) $.
cznrng.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` Y ) $.
cznnring $p |- ( ( N e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ C e. B ) -> X e/ Ring ) $.
$d .0. x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x y $.
